Uses of Package
moulton.scalable.draggables

Packages that use moulton.scalable.draggables
Package Description
moulton.scalable.containers
The containers package contains classes that are intended for holding menu components, especially panel classes which serve as nodes in the menu rendering tree structure.
moulton.scalable.draggables
The draggables package contains clickable subclasses that are intended to be dragged or scrolled.
moulton.scalable.texts
The texts package contains classes and menu components that ar primarily dedicated to holding and processing text for display in the menu.
  • Classes in moulton.scalable.draggables used by moulton.scalable.containers
    Class Description
    ScrollableComponent
    Components that have attached ScrollBars should implement this interface.
    ScrollBar
    The scroll bar class is a Draggable component that handles mouse draggging and notifies a component to be scrolled.
  • Classes in moulton.scalable.draggables used by moulton.scalable.draggables
    Class Description
    DraggableComponent
    A type of MenuComponent that can be mouse dragged by the user and thus needs to be responsive in that regard through use of DraggableComponent.drag(double, double).
    ScrollBar
    The scroll bar class is a Draggable component that handles mouse draggging and notifies a component to be scrolled.
  • Classes in moulton.scalable.draggables used by moulton.scalable.texts
    Class Description
    DraggableComponent
    A type of MenuComponent that can be mouse dragged by the user and thus needs to be responsive in that regard through use of DraggableComponent.drag(double, double).
    ScrollableComponent
    Components that have attached ScrollBars should implement this interface.
    ScrollBar
    The scroll bar class is a Draggable component that handles mouse draggging and notifies a component to be scrolled.
